programmes.show_description: A documentary series comprising an eclectic selection of broad subjects.
This programme takes you on a five-star local journey with Korean actor Oh Ji-ho and trot singer Shin Seong, exploring hidden gems and unique experiences that reveal a fresh side of Korea.
Professional traditional music companies perform high-quality gugak performances which are vividly captured and conveyed through this series.
A documentary series comprising an eclectic selection of broad subjects.
What is the true strength of the K-people leading the K-Wave? We invite the most talked-about figures into our studio for intimate one-on-one conversations.
A weekend news program that summarizes the major issues of the current week and gives some expectations for the next week's events.

A documentary series about homes, people and space; this programme shows various houses in Korea and introduces the living culture and architectural technology of the country.
A programme about Korean culture and entertainment.
There is a growing interest in Korean literature among readers from around the world and so we bring Korean classics to Korean modern literature to viewers in this special series under three themes.
